PREFIX dcat: <http://www.w3.org/ns/dcat#>
PREFIX dcterms: <http://purl.org/dc/terms/>

DELETE 
	{ ?dist ?prop ?value }
WHERE
	{ 	?dist ?prop ?value .
		VALUES ?value { "afbeelding" "api" "API" "Rapport" "link" "kaart" "Kaart" "HTML Grafiek" } 
		VALUES ?prop { dcterms:format dcat:mediaType }
	}
